description: Manual namespace scope overrides for resources where the OpenAPI-derived scope doesn't match actual F5 XC behavior
generatedNote: These overrides are applied on top of the OpenAPI-derived scopes

system.description: Resources that should ONLY appear in the system namespace, regardless of their API path patterns
system.reason: These resources are tenant-level system objects that can only be managed in the system namespace

shared.description: Resources that should ONLY appear in the shared namespace
shared.reason: These resources are specifically designed to be shared across namespaces

any.description: Resources explicitly available in all user namespaces (shared, default, custom) but NOT system
any.reason: Override for resources incorrectly marked as system-only by API path analysis
